name: Hearthlands
description: Hearthlands is a medieval/fantasy city-building real time strategy game in which you take a role of a king in a procedurally generated world. You can not control your subjects directly; instead you focus on city-building, resource management, diplomacy, heroes, magic and other things a typical king deals with on a daily basis.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce / Radeon Sound Card: Open AL compatible sound card Additional Notes: Note! Integrated graphics adapters (like Inter HD Graphics) are currently not fully supported.
